    Methods in org.svvrl.goal.core.draw that return IdleDrawer 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static IdleDrawer<?> DrawerRepository.getIdleDrawer​(java.lang.Object obj, int x, int y, java.awt.Rectangle r)
    Returns an idle drawer capable of drawing the information of a specified object at a specified location with a specified visible area.
